name: 1nvas0r by Vitoco
description:
1nvas0r

(c) 2022 by Victor Parada

One invader, one button,

one shoot, one life.

Keep the Earth from safe

a lot of single invaders.

Game written for NOMAM's

BASIC 10-liners Contest 2022.

Requires:

- Atari XL/XE (or emulator)

- FastBasic 4.5.2 IDE

- 1 or 2 Joysticks

Game instructions:

- Press START for one player

  or SELECT for two players.

- Use the trigger to shoot

  and to change the moving

  direction.

- Press console keys to

  play again.
